job description:
Looking to hire an entry level environmental scientist. This will be a 75% office, 25% field based role. This is open due to their resources being scarce and other national projects going on.

Main Responsibilities
Will be mostly supporting a contract with the Post Office for emergency response and abatement work
Calling facilities to collect details and information on environmental risks and hazards
Getting data for bids together
Assisting in writing proposals
This will be an all-office based job but projects will deal with lead-based paint, mold, and other environmental hazards
